color: purple, red, silver, white, or blue

effects: 16 advanced filters (lighter or darker skin tones, skin softening, soft focus, etc.)
settings: manual control and various automatic settings (video modeburst shooting, etc.)

sensor_size: 23.5mm x 15.6mm [APS-C] X-Trans CMOS III with primary color filter
long_exposure: 30 seconds max with starry sky mode
